mapper.insert: insert into t_wms_storage (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, STORAGECODE, STORAGENAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storagecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_wms_storage set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGECODE = #{storagecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGENAME = #{storagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, STORAGECODE, STORAGENAME from t_wms_storage where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, STORAGECODE, STORAGENAME from t_wms_storage
